alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Decatur; Lucas; Ringgold; Wayne (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 8:28PM CDT until June 07 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Lucas County in south central Iowa... Decatur County in south central Iowa... Northwestern Wayne County in south central Iowa... Northeastern Ringgold County in south central Iowa... Southern Clarke County in south central Iowa... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 828 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Sun Valley Lake, or 13 miles southwest of Osceola, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Van Wert, Decatur City and Weldon around 840 PM CDT. Leon around 845 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Garden Grove. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 4 and 32. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
